explains: adj. 灭绝的；消亡的；（火山）死的；（贵族称号）无合法继承人的；熄灭了的

sentences.en: Herbalism had become an all but extinct skill in the Western world.
sentences.cn: 草药医术在西方世界几乎已成了一项绝迹的技术。

sentences.en: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.cn: 对绝种的生命形式进行克隆的想法仍然属于科学幻想。

sentences.en: Scientists are attempting to compare features of extinct animals with living analogues.
sentences.cn: 科学家正试图把已灭绝动物的特征与现存类似动物相比较。
